summary: I recently watched the documentary Gisèle Freund, portrait intime d’une photographe visionnaire and one of the scenes featured photographs taken by Gisèle during the celebration of the French National Day in 1954.  The images were captivating, perhaps the most fascinating ones from that event.  However, not a single photo captured the celebration itself...
